We are not until Sunday, we are together until the horizon, until we are together!
100 years ago, they drew boundaries with the ruler in these lands, but they can not draw boundaries to our correspondence, our common history, our common future.
They know well that they can not separate our hearts with barbed wire, walls.
Just as they can not separate the Turks from the Kurds, they can not separate the Kurds from the Turks.
Throughout history, we have struggled together against this brutality in these lands; after that we will be one heart against persecution.

PM Netanyahu to French President François Hollande at press conf: The deal that is being put on the table in Geneva is not a good deal.>
> I believe it's a bad deal and a dangerous one. I applaud the fact that you, personally, have taken a stance to make it tougher & firmer,>
> But I'm concerned, gravely concerned that this deal will go through and in one stroke of the pen it will reduce the sanctions on Iran. > >
> And in return for this Iran gives practically nothing. Like you, François, I want to see a peaceful solution, a diplomatic solution.
